description:
There is a reason we have the saying that “if the left had no double standards, they would have no standards at all.”

Charlamagne claims it’s okay to misgender Caitlyn Jenner because he’s a Trump supporter.


JUST IN: Charlamagne Tha God says its OKAY to MISGENDER Caitlyn Jenner.

Do leftists hate Trump supporters that much?pic.twitter.com/hWACnpXkHX
— Resist the Mainstream (@ResisttheMS) November 12, 2024

So are we no longer uplifting trans women or what? And I don’t know about you but that sounded a bi
title: Charlamagne Claims It's Permissible To Misgender Caitlyn Jenner Because He Is A Trump Supporter

description:
A queer, autistic, half-disabled woman with Lyme disease, who is also bisexual and her husband is also bisexual, and she has two daughters, no longer feels “safe” having a relationship with her parents because of all the reasons just mentioned, as she believes Trump cares about any of that.

This woman told her parents that she is cutting them out of her and her kids lives simply because they voted for Trump.

“Take me out of the will.”

“I never want you hear from you again.”

“I don’t feel safe being in a relationship with you.”

What would you like to say to… pic.twitter.com/CwcHkerbH2
— AmericanPapaBear (@AmericaPapaBear)
title: Watch: Left-wing looney tune brags about cutting her off her PARENTS because they voted for Trump

description:

title: LOL! CNN will lay off 100s of employees after MASSIVE drop in ratings, including superstar hosts

description:
Not only did FEMA waste loads of its funding on foreign nationals simply because these people broke federal immigration laws, but they reportedly instructed team leads to ignore homes for politically incorrect lawn signs. So not only did they dedicate resources to foreigners but they deliberately withheld it from the very people they were tasked to help.

The fired supervisor who told her team to skip homes with Trump signs is alleging that she was taking orders from higher-ups. And although that may or may not be true, that does not make it any less reprehensible. However, it does suggest there is a systemic problem in the bureaucracy that everyone already knew existed.

NEW: FEMA worker who was fired for instructing volunteers to not help homes with Trump signs is
title: Fired FEMA Worker: I Was Taking Orders From Higher Ups When Told To Ignore Homes With Trump Signs

description:
During the Panny D, the government thought they had the right to dictate which livelihoods were essential. And many government officials took this power trip so far that they even jailed people for daring to open their businesses as if they had no right to make a living.

One of those people jailed under these draconian mandates just won a seat in the Texas legislature.

WATCH: A salon owner who was jailed for seven days for staying open during COVID lockdowns wins Texas Republican House seat. pic.twitter.com/JpVHjA1lyT
— The Canadian Independent (@canindependent) November 11, 2024
title: Woman Jailed After Refusing To Close Salon During COVID Wins Seat On Texas Legislature

description:
The View’s Ana Navarro threw a hissy fit over Trump’s pick for Border Czar, and it’s worse than you think. Today’s show fact-checks these ladies who are not acting very ladylike.

- YouTube
title: Watch: The View Is Having A Nervous Breakdown Over Down Trump’s Border Czar And It's Hilarious

description:
Donald Trump has chosen South Dakota's smokeshow of a Governor Kristi Noem to head up Homeland Security. Or, he is rumored to be about to choose her. I'll be honest: the media coverage is starting to confuse me. I'm still not sure if Marco Rubio is secretary of state or not. But, as far as X-Twitter trends go, it's Noem to DHS. That's good enough for me.

Noem was rumored to be on the VP shortlist, but then that whole "killing a dog" thing happened. It will no doubt come up during her confirmation hearing from a Democrat senator looking for TV time—my guess is Cory Booker. Hopefully, it gets countered with a mention of the time she went all ham on a bunch of Amazo
title: Trump chooses Kristi Noem for DHS, here she is looking like a badass with a flamethrower

description:
Marco Rubio is set to be chosen as Donald Trump's Secretary of State. It's not official, and the reports say Trump could still change his mind. But the way things stand down, it's Rubio.

I know I'm expected to be "BOO, RINO, BAD," but Rubio was the first official I connected with, back when get was Florida's Speaker of the House and had "100 Innovative Ideas...," and was a keynote at the first CPAC I went to in 2009. The senator has also been stellar this year combating the media as an outspoken advocate for Trump and Trump's agenda. I think he's a good pick

For a taste of what Secretary Rubio looks like being diplomatic, take you back to November 2023 and the return of Code Pink. They were no
title: Trump picks Marco Rubio for Secretary of State, here he is crushing the hopes and dreams of leftists

description:
Republicans officially took the House last night, President Donald Trump will control both the House and the Senate during his 2nd term, we’re assessing the latest Trump administration cabinet positions, new conspiracy theories from election-denying leftists suggest the election was rigged in swing states, the View’s Ana Navarro threw a hissy fit over Trump’s pick for Border Czar, Tom Homan, meanwhile the German government collapsed last week after the ruling coalition fell apart, and so much more!

Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.
title: Sources: Breaking Down Trump’s New Cabinet Superteam
